briefTitle: Long-Term Administration Study of Aripiprazole as an Adjunctive Therapy in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
officialTitle: Long-Term Administration Study of Aripiprazole as an Adjunctive Therapy in Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
summary: To examine the safety and efficacy of long term administration of aripiprazole as an adjunctive therapy, co-administered with either a selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor (SSRI) or a selective-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor (SNRI), in subjects with major depressive disorder.
